name: Progress Circle
description: A circle used to show completed progress

progress.label: Progress
progress.description: The amount of progress to display. A number 0-1.

unfilledColor.label: Unfilled Color
unfilledColor.description: The color of the unfilled portion of the progress bar(eg. if at 50% then this is the color of the other 50%)

showsText.label: Show Progress Text
showsText.description: Shows progress in the middle of the circle

textStyle.label: Text Style
textStyle.description: Text Style of the inner circle

direction.label: Direction
direction.description: Direction that the circle renders in
